szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.game

Class PlayerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • szakacs.kpi.fei.tuke.arena.game.PlayerManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameUpdater, PlayerManagerBasic, PlayerManagerPrivileged, PlayerManagerUpdatable, ResettableGameClass

    public class PlayerManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerManagerPrivileged
    The managing class for all actors and their pipes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PlayerManager(GameConfig config, MethodCallAuthenticator authenticator) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Throwable getCrashReason(PlayerToken token)
      Gets the reason why a player has crashed during the game level, if he/she has crashed, otherwise it returns null.
      GameShop getGameShop()
      Gets an object which is responsible for anything the player buys while playing (repairing the pipe, buying bullets etc.).
      java.util.Map<PlayerToken,Pipe> getPipesUpdatable()
      Gets a set of currently active (not destroyed) pipes identified by the token of the player that owns them.
      java.util.Set<PlayerInfo> getPlayerInfo()
      Gets a set of all players in the current level and any info associated with them, such as the pipe assigned to them and their current score.
      java.util.Map<PlayerToken,PlayerInfo> getPlayerTokenMap()
      Gets a set of currently active players and associated info about them identified by their tokens.
      java.util.Map<TunnelCellBasic,java.util.Set<ActorBasic>> getPositionsToPipesMap()
      Gets a mapping between tunnel cells and any pipe actors (pipe heads or segments) that are at these positions.
      OnScoreEventCallback getScoreChangeCallback()
      Gets a callback object to use when setting player scores after some events.
      java.util.Map<PlayerToken,PlayerInfo> getUnregisteredPlayers()
      Gets a set of players identified by their tokens, that have failed in the current game level.
      void startNewGame(GameLevelPrivileged gameLevel, DummyLevel level)
      Performs the actions to reset the implementing class to its default state when a new game level begins.
      void update()
      Updates the specific aspects of the game logic particular to the implementing class.

      • getPositionsToPipesMap

        public java.util.Map<TunnelCellBasic,java.util.Set<ActorBasic>> getPositionsToPipesMap()
        Description copied from interface: PlayerManagerBasic
        Gets a mapping between tunnel cells and any pipe actors (pipe heads or segments) that are at these positions. Used for collision detection. Can be used to check if a position does not contain a pipe's component to avoid biting one's own or others' pipes.
        Specified by:
        getPositionsToPipesMap in interface PlayerManagerBasic
        Returns:
        a mapping between tunnel cells and pipe components.

      • getUnregisteredPlayers

        public java.util.Map<PlayerToken,PlayerInfo> getUnregisteredPlayers()
        Description copied from interface: PlayerManagerPrivileged
        Gets a set of players identified by their tokens, that have failed in the current game level. This could be due to throwing an exception or having had their pipes destroyed.
        Specified by:
        getUnregisteredPlayers in interface PlayerManagerPrivileged
        Returns:
        the set of failed players during the current game level identified by their tokens.

      • startNewGame

        public void startNewGame(GameLevelPrivileged gameLevel,
                         DummyLevel level)
                  throws GameLevelInitializationException
        Description copied from interface: ResettableGameClass
        Performs the actions to reset the implementing class to its default state when a new game level begins.
        Specified by:
        startNewGame in interface ResettableGameClass
        Parameters:
        gameLevel - the object representing the current game level
        level - the value object containing additional information to initiazlize the current game level
        Throws:
        GameLevelInitializationException - if some error has occurred which prevented initialization (malformed data in the value object etc.)
